# WhisperX

WhisperX advanced speech recognition with speaker diarization and improved timestamp accuracy.

*Documentation for specific functions in this module will be automatically generated from the codebase.*

## Usage

```python
import pixeltable as pxt

# Access WhisperX functions
pxt.ext.functions.whisperx.transcribe(audio, ...)
```

## Features

This extension provides:
- High-accuracy speech recognition
- Speaker diarization (identifying different speakers)
- Improved timestamp alignment
- Multiple language support
- Integration with Pixeltable's Audio data type

WhisperX builds upon OpenAI's Whisper with additional capabilities for production speech recognition workflows.
